devdoc.author: @wafflemakr
devdoc.details: Exchange contract for the Orion Protocol

checkPosition(address).details: write an orderHash in the contract so that such an order cannot be filled (executed)

deposit().details: deposit event will be emitted with the amount in decimal format (10^8)balance will be stored in decimal format too

depositAsset(address,uint112).details: Deposit ERC20 tokens to the exchange contractUser needs to approve token contract first

params.amount: asset amount to deposit in its base unit

fillOrders((address,address,address,addr.details: 2 orders are submitted, it is necessary to match them: check conditions in orders for compliance filledPrice, filledAmountbuyOrderHash change balances on the contract respectively with buyer, seller, matcbuyOrderHashher

params.filledPrice: price at which the order was settled

getBalance(address,address).details: Get asset balance for a specific address

params.assetAddress: address of the asset to query

getBalances(address[],address).details: Batch query of asset balances for a user

params.assetsAddresses: array of addresses of teh assets to query

getFilledAmounts(bytes32,(address,addres.details: get trades for a specific order

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner.     * NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

withdraw(address,uint112).details: Withdrawal of remaining funds from the contract back to the address

params.amount: asset amount to withdraw in its base unit
params.assetAddress: address of the asset to withdraw

devdoc.title: Exchange

deposit().notice: Deposit ETH to the exchange contract

fillOrders((address,address,address,addr.notice: Settle a trade with two orders, filled price and amount
